relation.name: contactlistOfaccount
relation.sql: select a.* from contact as a where a.accountId=?

relation.name: crmuser2activity
relation.sql: select * from (select activity.*\,activity.activity_type as act_type\,activity.status as act_status\, activity.contactId as contactName\, contact.accountId as accountName\,activity_event_type_pl.val as event_type_val\,account.name as accountName_val\, contact.name as contactname_val from activity\,contact\,activitycrmuser\,activity_event_type_pl\,account where contact.id= activity.contactId AND activitycrmuser.activityId=activity.id AND activitycrmuser.crmuserId=? AND activity_event_type_pl.id=event_type AND account.id=contact.accountId) as aActivity

relation.name: accountInfoOfContact
relation.sql: select * from (select account.* from contact\,account where contact.id=? AND account.id=contact.accountId) as act

relation.name: visitingOfContact
relation.sql: select * from (select * from (select activity.*\, activity.activity_type as act_type\, activity.status as act_status\, activity.contactId as contactName\, contact.accountId as accountName\, activity_event_type_pl.val as event_type_val\, account.name as accountName_val\, contact.grade as contactgrade\, contact.name as contactname_val from activity left join activity_event_type_pl on activity.event_type = activity_event_type_pl.id left join contact on activity.contactId = contact.id left join account on contact.accountId = account.Id left join activitycrmuser on activity.id = activitycrmuser.activityId where activity.contactId = ?) as aactivity where event_type = 1 order by whenadded DESC) as aActivity

relation.name: productBasic
relation.sql: select a.* from product as a where a.parentid=?

relation.name: productSpecificationOfProductLine
relation.sql: select p.* from product p left join product p1 on p1.id=p.parentid left join product p2 on p2.id=p1.parentid where p2.id=?
